00026 namespace indri {
00027   namespace index {
00028     class DocExtentListIterator {
00029     public:
00030       struct DocumentExtentData {
00031         int document;
00032         indri::utility::greedy_vector<Extent> extents;
00033         indri::utility::greedy_vector<INT64> numbers;
00034       };
00035

00040       virtual bool nextEntry() = 0;
00041       virtual bool nextEntry( lemur::api::DOCID_T documentID ) = 0;
00042       virtual DocumentExtentData* currentEntry() = 0;
00043     };
00044   }
